SELECT DISTINCT tac.activity_uuid, tac.city, tac.activity_name, tac.start_time, tac.end_time, tac.total_day, tac.unit_price, tac.user_no FROM tpm_activity tac INNER JOIN tpm_user_activity tua ON ( tac.activity_uuid = tua.activity_uuid ) INNER JOIN tpm_activity_original tao ON ( tao.project_id = tac.project_id )
tua.openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND tua.request_state = 2 AND tua.request_activity_day = CURDATE() AND tua.reject_flag !=1
AND tac.end_time >= CURDATE()
AND tac.end_time < CURDATE()
AND (tac.stop_flag is NULL OR tac.stop_flag='0' OR tac.stop_flag='')
ORDER BY tac.start_time DESC,tac.end_time ASC

SELECT tac.activity_uuid, tac.city, tac.activity_name, tac.start_time, tac.end_time, tac.total_day, tac.unit_price, tac.user_no FROM tpm_activity tac INNER JOIN tpm_user_activity tua ON ( tac.activity_uuid = tua.activity_uuid ) INNER JOIN tpm_activity_original tao ON ( tao.project_id = tac.project_id ) WHERE tua.openid = #{openid} AND tua.request_state = 2 AND tua.request_activity_day=#{requestActivityDay} AND tua.reject_flag !=1 AND (tac.stop_flag is NULL OR tac.stop_flag='0' OR tac.stop_flag='') ORDER BY tac.start_time DESC,tac.end_time ASC

SELECT tac.activity_uuid, tac.city, tac.activity_name, tac.start_time, tac.end_time, tac.total_day, ( SELECT count(1) FROM tpm_user_activity tua WHERE tua.activity_uuid = tac.activity_uuid AND tua.request_state = 2 ) count, tac.user_no, tac.work_hours, tac.unit_price FROM tpm_activity tac INNER JOIN tpm_activity_original tao ON ( tac.project_id = tao.project_id )
tac.city LIKE #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/' AND tac.end_time > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND (tac.stop_flag is NULL or tac.stop_flag = '0' or tac.stop_flag = '')
ORDER BY tac.start_time DESC ,tac.end_time ASC

SELECT tac.activity_uuid, tac.activity_name, tac.start_time, tac.end_time, tac.total_day, ( SELECT count(1) FROM tpm_user_activity tua WHERE tua.activity_uuid = tac.activity_uuid AND tua.request_state = 2 ) count, tac.user_no, tac.work_hours, tac.unit_price, tem.person_name, tem.mobile FROM tpm_activity_original tao INNER JOIN tpm_activity tac ON ( tao.project_id = tac.project_id ) INNER JOIN tpm_employee tem ON ( tac.manager = tem.person_code )
tac.activity_uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT tac.activity_name FROM tpm_activity tac WHERE tac.activity_uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM tpm_activity WHERE activity_uuid = #{activity_uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT tac.activity_uuid, tac.activity_name, tac.manager, tac.start_time, tac.end_time, tac.total_day, ( SELECT count(1) FROM tpm_user_activity tua WHERE tua.activity_uuid = tac.activity_uuid AND tua.request_state = 2 ) count, tac.user_no FROM tpm_activity tac
tac.manager = #{managerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (tac.stop_flag is NULL OR tac.stop_flag='0' OR tac.stop_flag='')
ORDER BY tac.start_time DESC,tac.end_time ASC

SELECT tac.total_fee totalFee, tao.projected_sales_no projectedSalesNo, tao.projected_sales_money projectedSalesMoney, tao.estimated_cost_rate estimatedCostRate, tac.request_create_time requestCreateTime, tpr.request_company_code companyCode, td1.org_name requestDeptName, tao.fee_detail_type feeDetailType, tpr.request_info requestReasons, tpr.request_telphone requestTelphone, tac.activity_name projectName, tac.start_time startTime, tac.end_time endTime, tac.total_day totalDay, tac.dept, td2.org_name deptName, tee1.person_name requestUserName, tao.note, tee2.person_name managerName, tao.cost_center costCenter, tao.order_no orderNo, tac.city, tac.district, tac.user_no userNo, tac.work_hours workHours, tac.unit_price unitPrice, tac.incentive_amount incentiveAmount, tac.settlement_method settlementMethod, tac.settlement_cycle settlementCycle FROM tpm_activity tac LEFT JOIN tpm_activity_original tao ON ( tac.project_id = tao.project_id ) LEFT JOIN tpm_project tpr ON ( tac.request_id = tpr.request_id ) INNER JOIN tpm_dept td1 ON ( tpr.request_dept = td1.org_code ) INNER JOIN tpm_dept td2 ON ( tac.dept = td2.org_code ) INNER JOIN tpm_employee tee1 ON ( tpr.request_user = tee1.person_code ) INNER JOIN tpm_employee tee2 ON ( tac.manager = tee2.person_code )
tac.activity_uuid = #{acitvityUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tac.manager = #{managerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT tub.openid, tub.`name` userName, tub.sex, tux.sex wxSex, tua.request_state requestState FROM tpm_user_activity tua, tpm_activity tac, tpm_user_base_info tub, tpm_user_wx_info tux WHERE tua.activity_uuid = tac.activity_uuid AND tua.openid = tub.openid AND tub.openid = tux.openId AND tac.activity_uuid = #{acitvityUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tac.manager = #{managerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tua.request_activity_day=#{requestActivityDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tua.reject_flag !=1
AND tua.request_state = 2
ORDER BY tub.`name`

SELECT tub.openid, tuw.headImgUrl, tub.`name` userName, tub.sex , tuw.sex wxSex, tub.mobile, tub.id_card, tub.address, tub.idimgurl_front, tub.idimgurl_back, tub.account_name, tub.open_province, tub.open_city, tub.account_bank_name, tub.open_branch, tub.account_value FROM tpm_user_base_info tub, tpm_user_wx_info tuw WHERE tub.openid = tuw.openid AND tub.openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT ta.activity_uuid activityUuid, ta.project_id projectId, ta.dept, ta.city, ta.manager, ta.start_time startTime, ta.end_time endTime, ta.total_day totalDay, ta.activity_name activityName, tao.project_name projectName FROM tpm_activity_original tao, tpm_activity ta, tpm_user_statement tus WHERE tao.project_id = ta.project_id AND ta.activity_uuid = tus.activity_uuid AND ta.dept IN
#{item}
AND ta.activity_uuid NOT IN( SELECT DISTINCT activity_uuid FROM tpm_user_statement WHERE request_state = 2 )
AND tus.request_state = 2
AND tus.request_state >= 2 ORDER BY ta.start_time DESC,ta.end_time DESC
SELECT te.person_name,te.mobile,ta.settlement_method FROM tpm_activity ta,tpm_employee te WHERE ta.activity_uuid = #{activity_uuid} AND ta.manager = te.person_code
SELECT COUNT(openid) FROM tpm_user_activity WHERE activity_uuid = #{activity_uuid} AND request_state = 2 AND request_activity_day=#{requestActivityDay} AND reject_flag !=1

SELECT tub.openid, tub.`name` userName, tux.sex, tub.id_card, tua.request_state requestState FROM tpm_user_activity tua, tpm_user_base_info tub, tpm_user_wx_info tux WHERE tua.openid = tub.openid AND tub.openid = tux.openId AND tua.activity_uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY tub.`name`

SELECT tub.openid, tub.`name` userName, tub.sex, tux.sex wxSex, tua.request_state requestState, tua.request_activity_day requestActivityDay FROM tpm_user_activity tua, tpm_activity tac, tpm_user_base_info tub, tpm_user_wx_info tux WHERE tua.activity_uuid= tac.activity_uuid AND tua.openid = tub.openid AND tub.openid =tux.openId AND tua.activity_uuid = #{activityUuid} AND tua.request_state = 1 AND tua.reject_flag !=1 AND tua.request_activity_day >= CURDATE() ORDER BY tua.request_activity_day ASC

SELECT tpr.request_id requestId, tpr.request_user requestUser, tac.activity_uuid activityUuid, tac.activity_name projectName, tpr.request_company_code companyCode, td.org_name deptName, tac.city, tac.manager, tee.person_name managerName, tee1.person_name requestUserName, tac.start_time startTime, tac.end_time endTime, tac.stop_flag stopFlag, CASE WHEN tac.start_time > CURDATE() THEN 0 WHEN ( tac.start_time <= CURDATE() AND tac.end_time >= CURDATE() ) THEN 1 ELSE 2 END activityState, tac.user_no userNo, tac.total_day totalDay, tac.unit_price unitPrice, tac.district FROM tpm_activity tac LEFT JOIN tpm_project tpr ON ( tac.request_id = tpr.request_id ) LEFT JOIN tpm_activity_original tao ON ( tac.project_id = tao.project_id ) INNER JOIN tpm_dept td ON (tao.dept = td.org_code) INNER JOIN tpm_employee tee ON ( tac.manager = tee.person_code ) INNER JOIN tpm_employee tee1 ON ( tpr.request_user = tee1.person_code )
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND tac.manager = #{personCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND ( tac.manager = #{personCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR tpr.request_user = #{personCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
AND tpr.request_id LIKE #{params.requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/'
AND tac.activity_uuid LIKE #{params.activityUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/'
AND tac.activity_name LIKE #{params.projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/'
AND tac.dept = #{params.dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND tee1.person_name LIKE #{params.requestUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/'
AND tee.person_name LIKE #{params.managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/'
AND td.org_name LIKE #{params.deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/'
AND tac.start_time >= #{params.startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND tac.end_time <= #{params.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND tac.start_time > CURDATE()
AND tac.start_time <= CURDATE() AND tac.end_time >= CURDATE()
AND tac.end_time < CURDATE()
AND tac.city LIKE #{params.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/'
ORDER BY tac.start_time DESC

SELECT DISTINCT tac.activity_uuid activityUuid, td.org_name deptName, tee.person_name managerName, tac.activity_name projectName, tuw.openid, tub.`name` userName, tub.sex, tuw.sex wxSex, tub.mobile telPhone, tuw.nikeName weixinName, tub.id_card idCard, tua.request_time requestTime, tua.audit_time auditTime, tua.request_state requestState, tua.request_activity_day activityDay, tac.manager FROM tpm_user_base_info tub INNER JOIN tpm_user_activity tua ON (tua.openid = tub.openid) INNER JOIN tpm_activity tac ON ( tua.activity_uuid = tac.activity_uuid ) INNER JOIN tpm_project tpr ON ( tpr.request_id = tac.request_id ) INNER JOIN tpm_activity_original tao ON ( tac.project_id = tao.project_id ) INNER JOIN tpm_user_wx_info tuw ON (tuw.openid = tub.openid) INNER JOIN tpm_dept td ON (td.org_code = tac.dept) INNER JOIN tpm_employee tee ON ( tac.manager = tee.person_code )
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND tac.manager = #{personCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (tpr.request_user = #{personCode} OR tac.manager = #{personCode})
AND tac.manager = #{personCode} AND CURDATE() <= tac.end_time AND tua.request_activity_day >= CURDATE()
AND tub.`name` LIKE #{params.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/'
AND tub.mobile LIKE #{params.telPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/'
AND tub.id_card LIKE #{params.idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/'
AND td.org_name LIKE #{params.deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/'
AND tua.request_state = #{params.requestState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND SUBSTR(tua.request_time,1,10) = #{params.requestTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND tac.activity_name LIKE #{params.projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/'
AND tee.person_name LIKE #{params.managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ESCAPE '/'
AND (tac.stop_flag is NULL OR tac.stop_flag='0' OR tac.stop_flag='') AND tua.reject_flag =0 -- AND (tua.request_activity_day >= CURDATE() AND tua.reject_flag =0 )
ORDER BY tua.request_time DESC
